tasks.title: ğŸ¤– Setup PM Agent Sub-agent
tasks.description:
Create and configure a Project Manager AI assistant that acts as PM via chat. This agent will help with:
- Breaking down tasks into subtasks
- Prioritizing work items
- Estimating effort/time
- Tracking progress across projects
- Following up on deadlines
- Documenting decisions and summaries

**Approach:** Create this as a sub-agent in OpenClaw with its own memory file for project tracking.

**Delivery:** User will interact with PM agent via Telegram â€” create sub-agent session that can receive messages via Telegram channel.

subtasks.title: Design PM agent identity and scope
Test PM agent with sample task breakdown

tasks.dod: PM agent responds to project management requests via chat and maintains project tracking memory

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Started setup - user wants to interact with PM agent via Telegram
